metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28487 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Tcpreplay version 4.4.1 contains a memory leakage flaw in fix_ipv6_checksums() function. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28487` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.4.1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.1-2ubuntu1').
